sentences.en: He is charged with the strangulation of two students.
sentences.cn: 他被指控勒死了两名学生。

sentences.en: In strangulation, the ultimate evidence would be the murderer's fingerprints on the victim's neck.
sentences.cn: 在扼杀案件中, 最终证据是凶手在被害人颈部的指纹.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the diagnostic value of ultrasonography for early strangulation loop in intestinal obstruction.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨腹部B超 对早期绞窄性肠梗阻的诊断价值.

sentences.en: She died of strangulation and her neck broke. Wear simple clothes next time!
sentences.cn: 她因勒颈窒息而亡,而且她的脖子也断了.

sentences.en: She's got bruising to the neck, which is consistent with manual strangulation.
sentences.cn: 她颈部有擦伤, 应该是扼杀留下的痕迹.

sentences.en: Slice you up and cook you after you're murdered by strangulation.
sentences.cn: 当你勒杀之后被把你割成两半然后把你翻炒.

sentences.en: Strangulation or will affect the machine life.
sentences.cn: 否则会影响机绞的寿命.

sentences.en: That strangulation scene would send corseted Victorian ladies spiraling to the floor.
sentences.cn: 那压抑窒息的场景会令穿着紧身束腰的维多利亚时代女子眩晕倒地.

sentences.en: The pre - operative diagnosis of small intestinal strangulation due to an adhesion ileus is often difficult.
sentences.cn: 摘要手术前诊断粘黏性肠阻塞的肠环的绞榨一直是困难的.

sentences.en: There is strangulation of tissue and poor blood supply.
sentences.cn: 组织有绞窄且血液供应差.

trans.tran_en: the act of killing someone by pressing on their throat, or the fact of being killed in this way
